    BoldnRepair

BoldnRepair specializes in the service, repair, and maintenance of All Major Brands.

Commercial and home services available

BoldnRepair offers washer, dryer, dishwasher, oven, range, refrigerator, and microwave service, repair, and mantenance. We service all major brands including Kenmore, Whirlpool, GE, LG, Bosch, Maytag, Frigidaire, Jenn-Air, and many many more.

We know the routine

And hear the stories.

Search for appliance repair companies and read through endless reviews only to find yourself reading that fix it all tutorial.. That is about the time most realise they are holding the tech sheet upside down. We understand first hand, appliances are valuable, but more importantly, so is your time! Let BoldnRepair get your appliance working now, so you can get back to spending your time on more important things.
